valid_from.description: The begin date of the validity of the security infos

valid_to.description: The end date of the validity of the security infos

created.description: The creation timestamp of the security infos

title.description: The title of one security info

infoType.description: The level of the security info

message.description: The text of one security info

urls.description: Array of links to external information

items.description: The link to a related page for one security info
